article.Heading: Budget 2016: Buy SBI, HUL, SKS Microfinance, LIC Housing: Ashwani Gujral
article.Summary: Ashwani Gujral - Fund manager at ashwanigujral.com recommends buying State Bank of India, Hindustan Unilever, SKS Microfinance and LIC Housing Finance.
article.Body:
Ashwani Gujral - Fund manager at ashwanigujral.com told CNBC-TV18, "Since we all are supposed to be positive for the day, State Bank of India (SBI) is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 150 for target of Rs 164. Anything positive will lead to a rally and that should be the guess that people should be taking."

"Hindustan Unilever (HUL) is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 840 for target of Rs 875. It has been positive in a good market and should do well," he said.

"SKS Microfinance is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 460 for target of Rs 500."

"Generally, Budgets tend to be good for housing finance, all housing finance companies have gone through a correction, so LIC Housing is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 400; look for a targets of Rs 421."

"Aurobindo Pharma is up another 5 percent, so that is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 638 for target of Rs 660." 

"United Spirits which was the sell on Friday also is now moving in the correct direction which is down. It is a sell with a stop loss of Rs 2,720; look for targets of Rs 2,580." 

"DHFL has opened up fairly well, it is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 154, target of Rs 168."

"PC Jeweller is sell with a stop loss of Rs 312, target of Rs 285. Even Tata Elxsi is down. Also you have the Budget sensitivities like NBCC which is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 850, target of Rs 915. You can look at a Fortis which is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 164, target of Rs 178."

"For ITC, 10 percent move from the lows may indicate that it has bottomed out for a bit and you may have a Rs 315-320 type of rally on the stock." 

"If you have to be long, probably you could look at something like Heritage Food where advantages are given to dairy, etc. It is a buy with a stop loss of Rs 535 and target of Rs 585." 

"In banks, maybe State Bank of India (SBI) and ICICI Bank where there are a lot of shorts but not in general all banks, I believe may be 1 percent or 2 percent more on Bank Nifty is possible, 14,350-14,400; but not much more than that." 

"Cummins India is looking extremely weak, so that is a sell with a stop loss of Rs 815 for target of Rs 790."

"Titan Company is a sell with a stop loss of Rs 325 and target of Rs 300 with the government going after luxury items."
